form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
leveling
in
leveled
.

sense.def:
A level
je točka na merilu ali lestvici, na primer za količino, pomembnost ali težavnost.

seg.quote: Mammals maintain their body temperature at a constant level.

sense.def:
The level of a lake or river
ali
the level of a liquid in a container
je višina gladine jezera, reke ali tekočine v posodi.

seg.quote: The level of the lake continues to rise.
Check the oil level and tyre pressure of your car regularly.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
at the level of another thing
, je na isti višini kot druga.

seg.quote: He had a pile of books which reached to the level of his chin.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
level with another thing
, je v isti višini kot druga.

seg.quote: He had his hands in front of him, level with his chest.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer trgovina,
stays level with something else
, postane večje ali manjše z enako hitrostjo kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Food production is going to keep level with population growth.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo nekam gre in
draws level with someone
, se mu približa, dokler ni ob njegovi strani.

seg.quote: Coming towards me was a man and when we drew level, I smiled.

sense.def:
Kar je
level
, je popolnoma ravno, tako da noben del ni višji od drugega.

To level an area of land
pomeni neko zemljišče narediti ravno.

To level something
, na primer stavbo ali gozd, pomeni popolnoma ga podreti, da nič ne ostane.

seg.quote: Specially built tractors levelled more than 1,000 acres of forest.

sense.def:
To level a criticism or accusation at or against someone
pomeni nekoga kritizirati ali obtožiti.

seg.quote: Serious charges were levelled at television during the sixties.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
levels off
ali
levels out
, se preneha povečevati ali zmanjševati.

cit.quote: ustaliti se, umiriti se, uravnovesiti se

seg.quote: Economic growth was starting to level off.

sense.def:
Kadar letalo
levels off
ali
levels out
, leti vodoravno, ko je prej letelo navzgor ali navzdol.
